title: Filler text generator
text: To generate customisable random filler texts, for developers.

title: Encrypter
text: A tool to perform encryption, using a symmetrical-key algorithm (based on the simple XOR chipher).

title: Calendar
text: A simple calendar, to stay on schedule.

title: Letter mixer
text: A tool to mix letters in a text, using a permutation key.

title: Text analyser
text: To show all sort of information about a text, letters frequency, words count etc.

title: Units converter
text: To convert stones to tons, inches to kilometers, or any other exotic unit to an other exotic one.

title: Rubbish generator
text: To write random sentences, just for fun.
